DOC.detailed_description: Each participant receive 3 dos 1 3 lot investigational hexavalent vaccine control vaccine , Infanrix hexa™ , administer Prevenar™ 2 , 4 , 6 month age Rotarix™ 2 4 month age . All participant monitor safety 6 month last injection primary vaccination series .
